properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 7 at 8:21AM MST until January 7 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow
accumulations of 4 to 7 inches above 4000 feet, including
Lookout Pass, 1 to 3 inches and a mix of snow and freezing rain
below 4000 feet. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow.
Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches above 4000 feet
during the afternoon and evening.

* WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains,
Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to
Haugan.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until noon MST today. For
the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult west of Saint Regis and
over Lookout Pass through this morning.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY
